column6: GET MYSTIQUE PART 3 Wolverine's mission has put him on the trail of the shapeshifter Mystique. In an effort to evade Logan, Mystique has chosen to hide among a group of American soldiers. Is Wolverine willing to cut them down to get to his prey?
column8: | writer:Jason Aaron | penciller (cover):Ron Garney | colorist:Jason Keith | letterer:Cory Petit
